snippet.title: Retromancer Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Retromancer is a frantic, fantasy themed twin-stick shooter with a stylish, chunky pixel aesthetic and 4 playable characters to choose from as you battle across 30 stages alone or with up to 3 friends.

Be sure to subscribe to the Spinfoam Games channel to stay up to date on Retromancer's development.

You can also visit https://www.spinfoamgames.com/retromancer and sign up for the Spinfoam Games mailing list!
